alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 31 at 7:56PM EDT until September 01 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EDT FRIDAY... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Water levels may approach flood stage in isolated locations tonight. Minor flooding is possible in low lying areas. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 1 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/12 AM 10.7 1.9 0.6 2-3 None 01/01 PM 10.0 1.2 0.5 3-4 None 02/01 AM 10.2 1.4 0.2 3-4 None 02/02 PM 9.9 1.1 0.2 3 None 03/02 AM 9.8 1.0 0.1 3 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/12 AM 11.1 1.6 0.7 2 Minor 01/01 PM 10.3 0.8 0.6 3 None 02/01 AM 10.6 1.1 0.3 3 None 02/02 PM 10.2 0.7 0.3 3 None 03/02 AM 10.2 0.7 0.2 3 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/12 AM 12.0 2.3 0.5 1 Minor 01/01 PM 11.3 1.6 0.6 1 None 02/01 AM 11.6 1.9 0.2 1 None 02/01 PM 11.1 1.4 0.2 2 None 03/02 AM 11.1 1.4 0.1 2 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
